document.heading: Voluntary Agreement Moratorium Emergency Amendment Act of 2024
To amend on an emergency basis the Rental Housing Act of 1985 to maintain a moratorium on voluntary agreements.
document.text: BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Voluntary Agreement Moratorium Emergency Amendment Act of 2024".

section.text: Section 215a of the Rental Housing Act of 1985, effective July 17, 1985 (D.C. Law 6-10; D.C. Official Code § 42-3502.15a(a)), is amended by striking the phrase "for one year beginning on October 1, 2023" and inserting the phrase "before January 1, 2025" in its place.

section.heading: Fiscal impact statement.
section.text: The Council adopts the fiscal impact statement of the Budget Director as the fiscal impact
statement required by section 4a of the General Legislative Procedures Act of 1975, approved October 16, 2006 (120 Stat. 2038; D.C. Official Code § 1-301.47a).

section.heading: Effective date.
section.text: This act shall take effect following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the
Mayor, action by the Council to override the veto), and shall remain in effect for no longer than
90 days, as provided for emergency acts of the Council of the District of Columbia in section
